abilities.desc: At the start and end of your turn, you may Teleport 3.

abilities.desc: When you Bleed, you may Teleport 3.

actions.name: Leap In
actions.desc: Teleport 3. Then, deal 2 damage to an enemy within range.

actions.name: Leap Out
actions.desc: Deal 2 damage to an enemy within range, then teleport 3. Then, choose one: Deal 2 damage to a different enemy within range; -or- heal 2; -or- gain 2 Power tokens.
